name: ruffle (ring) sterling silver metalwork
description:
a bold ring that mixes the romance of ruffles and flower petals with blackened silver and soft blue glass enamel.

entirely hand-fabricated from sterling silver this sculptural rings widest petal is about 3/4 of an inch across (1.9 cm)

this ring has a sturdy, hardened, open band for comfort. i can adjust it to the size of your choice.

___________________________________________________
all items from smashing come in a decorated gift box.

within the US, shipping is USPS 2-3 day priority mail with delivery confirmation/tracking. international shipping is by USPS 6-10 day priority mail which does not include delivery confirmation or tracking. 

please read through smashing's shop policies for complete information about your order.

name: spotted (ring) sterling silver metalwork
description:
-this ring is made when you order. your ring will vary slightly from the sample shown in the pictures. please allow 3 days after purchase for fabrication before shipping.-

a 7/16 of an inch sterling silver disc has been hammered, textured and fused with beautiful ground glass at temperatures around 1500F, then hard-soldered to a dainty and playful handmade ring.

all metal is sterling silver.

options.name: other (i will contact you to discuss the best size)

name: teeming vines (earrings) sterling silver and glass enamel
description:
delicate and colorful. yay!

handmade earrings in sterling silver and fused glass enamel. the earwire and each petal-y part and shape is formed with heat and hammer. each color is made with a layer of glass, permanantly fused to the metal with 1500˚F heat.

oxidized for a beautiful charcoal gray color and burnished for a bit of shine.

total length from top to bottom is about 1 1/4 inches (3.2 cm) all metal is sterling silver. because these earrings are individually hand made, there will be slight variations in size and color. yay handmade! :)
